selected_quotes: Capsaicin (from cayenne pepper/chilli peppers, etc) can help control appetite and boost weight loss!
Revisión: El picante (2 mg de capsaicinoides) puede ayudar a reducir la ingesta de energía #strategy #weightloss
Our new meta analysis on capsaicinoids weight management soon to be published in Appetite.
Could capsaicinoids help to support weight management? A systematic review meta-analysis: htt…

citation.abstract: Capsaicinoids are a group of chemicals naturally occurring in chilli peppers with bioactive properties that may help to support weight management. The aim of the present study was to conduct a meta-analysis investigating the potential effects of capsaicinoids on energy intake, to clarify previous observations and form evidence-based conclusions about possible weight management roles.
citation.title: Could capsaicinoids help to support weight management? A systematic review and meta-analysis of energy intake data
